name: Ragdoll
metaDescription: Ragdoll cats face HCM, bladder stones, and obesity risks. Compare the best pet insurance for Ragdolls—coverage for heart disease, urinary issues & more.
intro: Ragdolls are gentle, docile cats known for going limp when held—hence the name. These large, laid-back cats are prone to hypertrophic cardiomyopathy (HCM), bladder stones, and weight issues. Insurance helps manage these potential health costs.
whyInsurance: Ragdolls face HCM (common in the breed), urinary tract issues including painful bladder stones, and obesity-related problems. A single bladder surgery can cost $3,000+. Insurance provides financial protection.
mustHave: Cardiac coverage — HCM is common in Ragdolls
Urinary condition coverage — Bladder stones are prevalent
High annual limits — FIP treatment is extremely expensive
Hereditary condition coverage — Multiple genetic risks

faqs.question: Is pet insurance worth it for a Ragdoll cat?
faqs.answer: Yes. Ragdolls are prone to HCM and bladder stones—both can result in thousands in vet bills. Their gentle nature means they're indoor cats, but health risks remain. Insurance is a smart investment.

faqs.question: Are Ragdolls prone to heart disease?
faqs.answer: Yes. Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy (HCM) is more common in Ragdolls than many breeds. Regular cardiac screening is recommended, especially from reputable breeders who test their cats.

faqs.question: Why do Ragdolls get bladder stones?
faqs.answer: Ragdolls are predisposed to calcium oxalate bladder stones. Diet, hydration, and genetics all play roles. Stones can require surgical removal costing $1,500-4,000+.

faqs.question: Do Ragdolls have weight problems?
faqs.answer: Their laid-back nature means less activity, making them prone to obesity. Overweight cats face diabetes, joint issues, and other problems. Monitoring diet and encouraging play helps.

faqs.question: Are Ragdolls expensive to insure?
faqs.answer: Moderate—similar to other large breeds. Expect $26-52/month for good coverage. Their health risks justify the investment in comprehensive insurance.

finalCta: Protect your gentle Ragdoll from unexpected health costs. Compare quotes and find the right coverage today.
